website_summaries.verdict: The best overall road cycling shoes meant for riders who want better comfort and performance.
pros: Solid one-piece construction makes these shoes more aerodynamic than most budget options
BOA fastener for a quick and proper fit with a single twist
Microtex material allows you to customize fit
cons: Shoes run on the narrow side

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes... but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice cycling shoes but these did not fit. I ordered per the mfr's. suggested sizing guide and I barely squeezed into them. Granted, I do have a slightly irregular foot but have never had to wear anything other than a normal width shoe, athletic or formal in style. I returned them within a day and was charged a re-stocking fee of around $7.00-8.00. Would be noce to know of re-stocking fees at the point of purchase. This has become more the norm and has me re-thinking buying on Amazon forward going. Sure, free 2-day shipping and returning.... until the re-stocking fee message pops up.
customer_reviews.author: MarkInNH

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I am 55 yrs old and have logged thousands of road miles ,in many different brands of shoes. I am a US 13.5 and the 48 Euro is a good fit. However, I was and am not happy that there is no lateral cleat adjustment ,only forward and backwards. In a $175.00 shoe that is not good. Also, the carbon injected sole is not as stiff as i prefer. Venting is superb. would i buy again? NO.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Everything was going good for 5 months until today when the shoe adjuster ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was going good for 5 months until today when the shoe adjuster or tighter device broke. Need to know if it can be repaired
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Garwacki

customer_reviews.title: Sized small
customer_reviews.text: I have size 11, wide feet. These shoes run about a half size small. I'm not going to mess around trying to return them and get burned for the fee. I'll just try to wear them in and hope they don't destroy my feet in the process. There's a pressure point on the outside widest point of my foot which is unpleasant after a 35 minute ride. Haven't tested them on a 4 hour ride yet. They look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good all round
customer_reviews.text: The nylon hybrid soul is nice and light and stiff but forgiving. Upper is very breathable and the boas are cool to see at this price point. Only gripe, and maybe this is just me, but the toe box is a little small. Not in width or length, but height (the tops of my toes rub the inside of the upper). If it fits your foot right, this is a great shoe. Also, replaceable heel bumpers would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to very good shoe - not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Very stiff. Noticeable improvement in power transfer compared to my old Sidi. Breathe well and retention . system works well for minor adjustments. Front width a bit narrow for wide (read EE and above) feet and the toe case is quite low. Cleat position is a fraction too far forward to give enough adjustment options but OK. They loosen up with use although I still have to ride with little tension in the adjuster. They look good though and for some that will be all that's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chilipadi

customer_reviews.title: I love them! Perfect size at 43EU/9
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Perfect size at 43EU/9.5US. Looks great, solid feel, lightweight. Also, not too bad too walk in. I use these with Shimano Dua Ace 9100. With proper bike fitting....PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: James R Dennis

customer_reviews.title: like the 105s
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a very noticeable curve to the sole, and my Shimano cleats get deformed no matter where I place them. This makes it nearly impossible to clip into pedals with tight tolerances, like the 105s.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Ships in nothing else but the shoe box
customer_reviews.text: Good product. *SHIPS IN NOTHING ELSE BUT THE SHOE BOX WITH LABEL SLAPPED ON SIDE** pray that it isn’t pouring down rain if your mail gets left on a porch like mine. Inside of box was soaked and it’s a miracle the shoes made it here. Could see the shoes from the holes in the side of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Fizik R4 UOMO BOA Road shoes are bye far the best bikeing shoes I have ever had. I recommend them. I average about 380 miles a week and these shoes really preform well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Allen Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Fit my big feet!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a shoe that fits my size 13 4E feet! Love the BOA system for adjusting. Nice looking shoe, as well. Great price, too. I've done 200 miles in them and they still feel great.
customer_reviews.author: hondo

customer_reviews.title: Great training shoe that looks sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Fizik does it again. Great pair of road cycling shoes and look fantastic. Have ridden them for​ about two weeks and the fit and finish is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerDan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived promptly and match my bike colors! I wasn't sure I would like the BOA lacing, but it's great for small, incremental adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Truth to Power

customer_reviews.title: Foot love
customer_reviews.text: European sizing helps with American odd feet. These are very comfortable and look sharp cruising down the road
customer_reviews.author: J Clark

customer_reviews.title: OK cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looks: 5 Star Comfort: 3 stars Fit: 3 Star, recommend a size up.
customer_reviews.author: H&k

customer_reviews.title: Look great and quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: Look great and quality is top notch. About a half size bigger than expected. Had to add shims under cleats due to foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect and the quality is what I'd expect from Fizik
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect and the quality is what I'd expect from Fizik, which is top class. BOA system just makes things easier to wear. It's my first time using this system, and I am totally sold. I wouldn't even bother trying any other because of the sheer convenience.
customer_reviews.author: minibus135

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, very comfortable, I’m a size 11US, ordered the 44.5, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cycling shoes I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Best cycling shoes I have owned. I have always had Shimano prior to these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stiff, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly (having used the sizing chart) and I love the BOA closure.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM! The BOA closure system makes it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ridden 200km in them already. LOVE THEM! The BOA closure system makes it a perfect fit every time! 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro BARRIOS

customer_reviews.title: Boa System Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: How can I claim the warranty, its not possible that this system broke after just one use. Regards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shor k
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Only regret isn’t buying them sooner. The fit is true and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit tight. Ordered 41.5, replaces with 42.0
customer_reviews.author: Camipilot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Fits well. Only had them for a month but so far I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Sharamitaro

product_meta.title: Fizik R4 UOMO BOA Road Cycling Shoes
product_meta.description: The R4B features Volume Control Technology and the Extended Power Strap for quick and easy adjustment to create perfect fit for comfort and performance. It is complemented by a combination of a single Boa IP1 and micro-strap closure system and injected composite sole
feature_bullets: High performance profession cycling shoe designed in Italy
Closure System: BOA IP1 and Micro straps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
